channel.title: Automation on Michael Abadi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Michael Abadi's Blog

item.title: Leverage Accessibility Identifier For View Debugging
item.description: Recently I have been fascinated with the fact many people, especially indie dev have started to think about accessibility for their application. However, there are still fewer resources on how do we kick off our journey in Accessibility with a more real-world use case that we can adapt. In this article, I would like to explain how do we utilize and incorporate the most basic Accessibility topics into our codebase, which is accessibilityId.

item.title: Trigger iOS Unit Test Check-In Github with Jenkins (Automation)
item.description: Wonder how to make automation for triggering the build and unit test in git with Jenkins? So this one could be the easiest tutorial you can follow. First let open our Jenkins web page, login, and create a new Free project. Once you create it, go to configure tab and you will go to this page below Fill up the textbox above on the description and tick the GitHub project row and fill in the project URL.
